snippet: The PGA Tour banned players from tossing items to fans at golf’s rowdiest hole, the 16th at the Phoenix Open, which is scheduled for Jan. 29 to Feb. 1.
abstract: PGA Tour bans players from tossing items to fans at the 16th hole of the Phoenix Open, considered to be sport's rowdiest.
lead_paragraph: The PGA Tour banned players from tossing items to fans at golf’s rowdiest hole, the 16th at the Phoenix Open, which is scheduled for Jan. 29 to Feb. 1.

headline.main: PGA Tour Bans Free-for-Alls at Phoenix
